title: The first and seconde partes || of the Herbal of William Turner Doctor in Phisick/ late=||ly ouersene/ corrected and enlarged with the Thirde parte/ lately ga=||thered/ and nowe set oute with the names of herbes/ in Greke || Latin/ English/ Duche/ Frenche/ and in the Apotheca=||ries and Herbaries Latin/ with the properties/|| ... of the same.|| Here vnto is ioyned also a Booke of the bath of Baeth in England/|| ... with diuerse other bathes/ moste || holsom ... in Almanye and England/|| set furth by William Turner ... ||
creator: Turner, William
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Turner, William: The first and seconde partes || of the Herbal of William Turner Doctor in Phisick/ late=||ly ouersene/ corrected and enlarged with the Thirde parte/ lately ga=||thered/ and nowe set oute with the names of herbes/ in Greke || Latin/ English/ Duche/ Frenche/ and in the Apotheca=||ries and Herbaries Latin/ with the properties/|| ... of the same.|| Here vnto is ioyned also a Booke of the bath of Baeth in England/|| ... with diuerse other bathes/ moste || holsom ... in Almanye and England/|| set furth by William Turner ... ||. Köln  Berlin 1568
